tags: like i'm obviously on Talos' side here but this black and white thinking annoyed me so much lmao
summary: It bothered me so much how the film acts like all the Skrulls are completely innocent and the Kree are just pure evil because...
body: It bothered me so much how the film acts like all the Skrulls are completely innocent and the Kree are just pure evil because that’s usually not how the real world works so I’m really glad Kevin Feige is at least aware of the issue “[…] there are probably good ones as we’ve seen in this film. And there are probably bad ones.“

reblog.comment: It bothered me so much how the film acts like all the Skrulls are completely innocent and the Kree are just pure evil because that’s usually not how the real world works so I’m really glad Kevin Feige is at least aware of the issue “[…] there are probably good ones as we’ve seen in this film. And there are probably bad ones.“

trail.content_raw: It bothered me so much how the film acts like all the Skrulls are completely innocent and the Kree are just pure evil because that’s usually not how the real world works so I’m really glad Kevin Feige is at least aware of the issue “[…] there are probably good ones as we’ve seen in this film. And there are probably bad ones.“
trail.content: It bothered me so much how the film acts like all the Skrulls are completely innocent and the Kree are just pure evil because that’s usually not how the real world works so I’m really glad Kevin Feige is at least aware of the issue “[…] there are probably good ones as we’ve seen in this film. And there are probably bad ones.“

summary: Clark Gregg explains the ‘screw it’ moment that made Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D. a hit
title: Clark Gregg explains the ‘screw it’ moment that made Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D. a hit
excerpt: Few shows have changed and evolved as much as ABC’s Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D. has across its five seasons. So what’s the moment that turned the show from good to great? Star Clark Gregg has it pinned down.

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: I'm So Sorry
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2WdYbAU

by TonyStark941

“Tony?” Bucky asked, but there was no answer. Just the sound of thick sobs echoing from the hospital bed. “I’m so sorry.”
**
From a young age, Tony thought he was worthless. A disappointment. Not good enough.

It takes one certain Winter soldier to tell him that he is (for once) entirely wrong.

Words: 3646, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: The Avengers (Marvel Movies), The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types, The Avengers - Ambiguous Fandom, Marvel Cinematic Universe, Marvel
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Bruce Banner, Thor (Marvel), Tony Stark, James “Bucky” Barnes, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Steve Rogers, Clint Barton
  • Relationships: James “Bucky” Barnes/Tony Stark, Clint Barton/Natasha Romanov
  • Additional Tags: Tony Stark Needs a Hug, Tony Feels, Hurt Tony, Hurt Tony Stark, Tony Stark Has Issues, Tony Stark Feels, Tony Has Issues, Insecure Tony, Sad with a Happy Ending, Oblivious Bucky Barnes, Oblivious Avengers, Arc Reactor, Arc Reactor Failure, Tony Stark Still Has Arc Reactor, Angst and Hurt/Comfort, Angst and Feels, Howard Stark’s A+ Parenting, Howard Stark’s Bad Parenting

summary: Spider-Man: Far From Home, nuovo trailer previsto per lunedì?
title: Spider-Man: Far From Home, nuovo trailer previsto per lunedì?
body:
Spider-Man: Far From Home, nuovo trailer previsto per lunedì?

Avengers: Endgame deve ancora uscire nelle sale (ormai manca un mese preciso) ma i Marvel Studios non vogliono perdere tempo, e hanno deciso di rilasciare qualche mese fa il primo teaser trailer per Spider-Man: Far From Home, il nuovo stand alone incentrato sullo Spider-Man interpretato da Tom Holland, ancora una volta diretto da Jon Watts. Ciò rischia di spoilerare parti della trama di Endgame,…

View On WordPress

blog.name: scavengingforwords
blog.title:
Fandom!
(largely Marvel Fandom)
blog.description: I'm a nerd who gets sucked into tons of fandoms, here is where I will gather my fandom love. Let’s be honest though, at this point this is like 99.99% Marvel and of that percentage 99% of it is Avengers Academy related.

blog.name: teamhellions
blog.title: Team Hellions
blog.description: The official Tumblr page for TeamHellions.com

summary: Falling in Love with Red She Hulk.
title: Falling in Love with Red She Hulk.
body:
Falling in Love with Red She Hulk.

Longtime readers will know my favorite comic book character ever is Speedball. A teenage Marvel Comics hero, member of the New Warriors, cause of Civil War, misunderstood and under rated. However, there was never a female hero that held equal regard for me. Not that there aren’t plenty of great characters out there, and many runs in my collection, but nothing went that extra step to be THE…

View On WordPress

blog.name: why-i-love-comics
blog.title: A blog dedicated to all your favorite moments
blog.description: Batman, Say it fast. Really fast. As fast as you can. Over and over. So what do you hear? Badman. Bad. Man. Batman. Badman. To me... Now and forever... one and                                             the same. - Peter J. Tomasi                                                                         all spoiler posts are tagged "wednesday spoilers"                                             add me on snapchapt! taskrnaster (with an RN instead of M)
